arts.ttl: Genoa to Release Special 24-25 'Boca Juniors' Fourth Kit
arts.sum: Genoa will launch a special 24-25 fourth shirt designed as a tribute to Boca Juniors on their 120th anniversary (3 April 1905 - 3 April 2025).
